text: Kyle Thomas Busch (born May 2, 1985) is a NASCAR race car driver. Busch races in the NASCAR Cup Series, Xfinity Series and the Craftsman Truck Series. Kyle's brother, Kurt Busch used to race in the NASCAR Cup series. Busch won his 100th NASCAR race on July 17, 2011. He is only the third driver in NASCAR history to do this. The other two drivers are Richard Petty with 200 wins, and David Pearson with 106 wins. With over 50 wins in the Nationwide series, Busch has more wins than any other driver in that series. At the end of the 2015 Sprint Cup Series, Kyle Busch won his first Sprint Cup Series Championship. As of December 9th 2019 he is the WWE 24/7 Champion after pinning R-Truth. ==References== Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:NASCAR drivers Category:American racecar drivers Category:Sportspeople from Las Vegas
title: Kyle Busch
